tool_description:
Instantly gets the price of a crypto currency.
Examples: ETHUSDT, BTCEUR, XRPBTC
title: Get Crypto Price

api_list.name: Endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://get-crypto-price.p.rapidapi.com/{pair}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "get-crypto-price.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
